posts.post_text: June 16, 2018 at 11:55 AM#2the replace function works on fixture parameters only.you need to manually edit your macrolines, but this time use names and/or wildcards (*) rather than numbers, so that you next time don't have to worry when moving stuff.e.g.old:Off Executor 3.2new:Off Executor "MyChasers".2orOff Executor "MyChasers"."SpotChase"orOff Executor *."SpotChase"

posts.post_text: July 1, 2018 at 12:11 AM#4HiEvery object can be called by its name (exec, seq, effect, macro, group, fixture,...)To change macro line with command line :assign macro 1."my macro".line_number /cmd="go exec 1.10"
